import { useReducer } from 'react'; import { INITIAL_STATE } from './postreducer'; import { postreducer } from './postreducer'; import './index.css' const Form = () => { const [state,dipstch] = useReducer(postreducer,INITIAL_STATE) const handelchange =e=>{ dipstch({type:"CHANGE_INPUT", payload:{name:e.target.name,value:e.target.value}}) console.log(state) } return (

Category:

Tags:

{state.tags.map((e)=>( {e} ))}
Quantity({state.quantity})
); }; export default Form;
